summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DurexEthiopia classified listings platform. All Priority 1 features (frontend sync with backend) are working correctly. Backend had missing 'aiofiles' dependency which was fixed. All 21 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI tests passed for navigation, filters, Post Listing form, Admin Dashboard, and Listing Modal.

minor.issue: Missing 'aiofiles' dependency - FIXED by adding to requirements.txt

critical_code_review_comments: Backend was missing 'aiofiles' package in requirements.txt - FIXED
All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
API endpoints properly handle pagination, filters, and admin operations

test_credentials.admin_user: TEST_admin@test.com / admin123 (role manually set to admin in DB)

seed_data_creation: Created test user and admin user for testing. Admin role was manually set via MongoDB.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Priority 1 features are working. Test users created: TEST_user@test.com and TEST_admin@test.com. Backend API tests are in /app/tests/test_backend_api.py. The 'aiofiles' dependency was missing and has been added to requirements.txt.

home_page.details: Hero section, navigation menu, search bar, filters all working

exotic_navigation_menu.details: All 11 category menu items found and working (All Escorts, Female Escorts, Male Escorts, Trans Escorts, Lesbians & Gay, Massage, Swingers, BDSM, Meet & Fuck, VIP & Premium)

filter_dropdowns.details: Category, Gender, Ethnicity, Location dropdowns all working

category_navigation.details: Navigation to /category/female works correctly, filters auto-applied

post_listing_page.details: Age, Gender, Race fields present and working after login

admin_dashboard.details: Users tab with user management (Suspend, Set Pending, Grant VIP, Delete) working

admin_listing_edit.details: Edit modal with Age, Race, Gender, Status, Featured fields working

listing_modal.details: View Full Profile link present and working

api_endpoints.details: GET /api/listings with pagination, GET /api/listings/count, PUT /api/admin/listings/{id}/edit, PUT /api/admin/users/{id}/status all working
